storefront.translation[0].definitions[0]: the part of a store that faces the street
storefront.translation[1].definitions[0]: the outside part of a shop that faces the street, usually with a large window
storefront.translation[1].definitions[1]: a website that a company uses to show its goods or describe its services, so that you can order and pay for them on the Internet SHOP FRONT British English
We have an online storefront with a shopping cart system included.
